Germantown YWCA

a template for creating simple digital exhibits

Collection Data

Download this collection's data in a variety of reusable formats.

Complete Metadata

All metadata fields for all collection items, available as a CSV spreadsheet (usable in Excel, Google Sheets, and similar programs) or JSON file (often used with web applications).

Metadata CSV Metadata JSON

Metadata Facets

List of unique values and their count for specific metadata fields, useful for understanding content of the fields.

Facets JSON

GeoJSON

Metadata for all collection items that have geographic coordinates in GeoJSON format, useful for further exploration and analysis of this collection through a geographical lense.

Geodata JSON

Website Source Code

GitHub repository containing source code for this project built with CollectionBuilder-GH.

Source Code

Collection Metadata

The table below provides sorting and basic search of the collection contents. Use the “CSV” or “Excel” button below to download the filtered metadata you see on the page in your preferred format. Alternatively, click the “Download” button at the top right to view the full collection metadata in various export formats.

Title Date Description Subjects Link

Germantown YWCA

CollectionBuilder-GH is a template for creating small digital collection exhibits on GitHub Pages designed for teaching digital library skills
